description: A standard healing potion.
name: Potion

description: A standard mental recovery potion.
name: Magic Water

description: A serum effective against status abnormalities.
name: Dispel Herb

description: An awakening drug. Restores consciousness to those unable to fight.
name: Stimulant

description: A rare herb that negates combat effects.
name: Undaun Herb

description: A healing potion with high expected efficacy. Not tasty, though.
name: High Potion

description: A healing potion with a speed boost effect.
name: Quick High Potion

description: Withered, but should provide the minimum expected efficacy.
name: Herb

description: There's no need to explain such a thing.
name: Decisive Drug

description:
A rare healing potion. Its effects are overwhelming, but due to its high cost,
many hesitate to use it, often found rolling next to the corpses of adventurers
in the depths of caves, still pristine.
name: Elixir

description:
The most rare healing potion. Its effects are tremendous, providing healing to
those around as well. The pure small bottle that sparkles and is slightly warm
brings courage to face hardships.
name: Elixir Tears

description: An advanced healing potion with higher expected efficacy. Tastes good as well.
name: Recover Potion

description:
Configure display settings for messages and set the display time for auto-
advance.
name: Message Display Settings

description: Move to the event recollection room.
name: Go to the Recollection Room

description:
Toggle on and off the display of armpit hair in event CGs. Please use if you're
not comfortable with it.
name: Armpit Hair Visibility Switch

description:
Fragments of shattered bone. If gripped, they easily crumble in the hand and
could be mixed with pebbles to use as a blinding agent.
name: Fine Ashes

description:
A magic item that temporarily enhances the attack ability of a single ally. A
special piece of paper with a simple spell written on it that can be used even
by those without magical knowledge. It disappears after use.
name: Attack Up

description:
A magic item that temporarily enhances the magical power of a single ally. A
special piece of paper with a simple spell written on it that can be used even
by those without magical knowledge. It disappears after use.
name: Magic Up

description:
A magic item that temporarily enhances the defense ability of a single ally. A
special piece of paper with a simple spell written on it that can be used even
by those without magical knowledge. It disappears after use.
name: Defense Up

description:
A magic item that temporarily enhances the magic resistance of a single ally. A
special piece of paper with a simple spell written on it that can be used even
by those without magical knowledge. It disappears after use.
name: Anti-Magic Up

description: An advanced mental recovery potion with high expected efficacy.
name: Magic Mist

description:
The towel Reisha used to wipe off body graffiti. It smells of dye and a woman's
soft scent.
name: Used Towel

description:
Semen expelled from the vagina to avoid unwanted pregnancy. The fingers slipped
in to scrape it out make the soft vaginal walls remember a stimulation they
should not accept.
name: Scraped Out Semen

description:
Shameful smegma scraped out from a lust-dirtied genitalia, mixed with lukewarm
semen. Whether it's from an unhygienic monster or left inside someone's frothy
genitals, it's indistinguishable now.
name: Foul-Smelling Smegma

description: Boasts abnormal recovery power but takes time to drink due to its large volume.
name: Elixir of Immortality

description: Imbues weapons with the attribute of fire.
name: Flame of

description: A key with complex shapes and "Experiment Area" engraved on it.
name: "Experimental Area" Key

description: A key with complex shapes and "Library" engraved on it.
name: "Archive Room" Key

description: A key with complex shapes and "Private Research Room" engraved on it.
name: "Personal Research Lab" Key

description:
A key with a simple shape and "Top Floor" engraved on it, used to unlock magical
locks.
name: "Top Floor" Key

description: One of the notebooks found in the library. It's titled "About Magic Golems."
name: Document 01-a "On Magic Golems"

description:
One of the notebooks found in the library. It's titled "About Magic Ore
Crystals."
name: Document 01-b "On Magic Ore Crystals"

description:
One of the notebooks found in the library. It seems to be written by the person
in charge of this research facility.
name: Document 01-c "Notes of a Magic Researcher 01"

description:
One of the notebooks found in the library. It seems to be written by the person
in charge of this research facility.
name: Document - "Notes of a Magic Researcher 02"

description:
One of the notebooks found in the study. It's titled "The Royal Family's
Misfortunes."
name: Document 02-a "The Royal Family's Misfortunes"

description: One of the notebooks found in the study. It's titled "The Prince's Defection."
name: Document 02-b "His Highness the Prince's Defection"

description:
One of the notebooks found in the study. It's titled "The Purity of Royal
Blood."
name: Document 02-c "On the Purity of the Royal Blood"

description: One of the notebooks found in the study. It's titled "Research on Bloodlines."
name: Document 03-a "On the Study of Bloodlines"

description: One of the notebooks found in the study. It's titled "About the Sword of Dawn."
name: Document 03-b "About the Sword of Dawn:01"

description: One of the journals found in the study. It's titled "About the Sword of Dawn."
name: Document 03-c "About the Sword of Dawn:02"

description: There's no need for an explanation for such a thing.
name: Seppuku Medicine (Individual)

description:
A proof of defeating a formidable enemy. It shares the knight's experience and
raises the entire party's level.
name: Knight's Honor

description:
A reasonably large fang dropped by a cave bat. Adventurers prefer to sell it for
money to enhance their equipment. It is often used more for decoration or as a
talisman than for practical purposes. [Use: DEF+3]
name: Vampire Bat Fang

description:
A stone polished inside a slime. Some are imbued with magical power, while
others are not. It's certain that one should wash it well before use. [Use:
MAT+3]
name: Pretty Stone

description:
The demons of human stagnation are oddly large. The blood they shed is black,
and the clotted remains are rich in magical residue. It will be treasured by
those seeking a magical catalyst. [Use: MDF+3]
name: Giant Rat's Black Blood

description:
The demons of human stagnation are oddly large. Hence, their snake eyes are
large, and a lot of skin can be harvested. It's just incidental loot, let's take
a little as a supplement to our wallet. [Use: LUK+3]
name: Red-Tongued Serpent's Eye

description:
The thread spun by an underground spider. Extremely convenient for setting
traps, and some professionals prefer to use it. Sturdy enough to easily deprive
something as small as a wild rabbit of its freedom. Rejoice, for tonight we
feast on meat. [Use: MHP+10]
name: Subterranean Spider's Thread

description:
A fragment resembling a crystal shard dropped by the security guards at the
magic research institute. Although it's a small piece, it has a magical presence
as if multiple spells have been woven into it. [Use: MAT+5]
name: Magical Ore Crystal Fragment

description:
A fragment resembling a crystal shard dropped by the monsters at the magic
research institute. Even those who are not adept at magic will find their
physical abilities enhanced just by possessing it, thanks to the astonishing
technology used to mass-produce it. [Use: AGI+5]
name: Magical Sensing Stone Fragment

description:
An evil eye charm dropped by a magician. It's an accessory made from a gemstone
favored by magicians, and there's a legend that it allows one to see in the
dark. It tends to be stolen often because of its high value. [Use: MMP+10]
name: Evil Eye Amulet

description:
The carrion eater is barbaric and gluttonous, consuming anything and everything.
Its favorite food is meat snatched from others weaker than itself. Magical
procedures have been applied to make it controllable, serving as a cleaner for
the facility. [Use: ATK+5]
name: Sturdy Bone

description:
A relatively large fragment of magical ore crystal attached to the monsters
wandering the magic research institute. Spells have been woven into it to allow
for control/restriction of actions and management of madness. [Use: MMP+10]
name: Large Magic Stone Fragment

description:
A small knife dropped by an assassin that reflects no light. Designed solely for
killing, it lacks the ruggedness of a utility blade, and its bare murderous
intent is evident. [Use: ATK+8]
name: Cleaner's Knife

description:
The vines of a plant monster wandering the magic research institute. Treated to
be controllable, its attacks on incoming intruders without will resemble that of
a movable trap. [Use: DEF+8]
name: Evil Plant Tendril
